review: This is an extremely scary movie-Im very desensitized towards violence and other images that would make most people show me what they had for breakfast...  But this movie has very extreme scenes - that made me cringe with disgust... this movie has a very original plot, the acting isn't too great (but Bruce Campell is the greatest- so it doesn't matter)- but you wont even think of it while playing the movie.
